Class ArchaiusConfigurationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.governator.configuration.ArchaiusConfigurationProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationProvider

    public class ArchaiusConfigurationProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigurationProvider
    Configuration provider backed by Netflix Archaius (https://github.com/Netflix/archaius)
